sentences.sentence: So I went to a realtor. And I liked this area, the shopping street.
sentences.translation: 很喜欢这个地区，这一条商店街，于是去找地产经纪。

sentences.sentence: And I asked the realtor, I said, "Why would anybody buy this place?"
sentences.translation: 我问房产经纪人：“你认为会有人买这幢破房子吗？”

sentences.sentence: And then she went to the realtor shop with me together, and I rented this apartment.
sentences.translation: 于是我们一起前往房地产经纪的店铺，把这公寓租下来。
